DataElement.preferredName: Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory Total Global Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total global score for the Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory Total Global Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 20-item self-report instrument designed to measure fatigue. It covers the following dimensions: General Fatigue, Physical Fatigue, Mental Fatigue, Reduced Motivation and Reduced Activity._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Covering or affecting the whole of a system._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 20-item self-report instrument designed to measure fatigue. It covers the following dimensions: General Fatigue, Physical Fatigue, Mental Fatigue, Reduced Motivation and Reduced Activity.

Concepts.definition: A 20-item self-report instrument designed to measure fatigue. It covers the following dimensions: General Fatigue, Physical Fatigue, Mental Fatigue, Reduced Motivation and Reduced Activity.
